select * from uspto_patent_info where version=#{version} order by patent_number LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
mapper.delete: DELETE uspto_patent_info,users_version FROM uspto_patent_info RIGHT JOIN users_version ON uspto_patent_info.version=users_version.version
